form.name: form1

div.span: Per the Governor's orders, there will be no school through May 1st. April 6 - 13 will be a break for students where no additional work will be assigned. April 14 will be the first date of newly assigned work from home for students and that work will continue through May 1st. Grades PreK-3 have had workbooks sent home. Grades 4-12 will access their work online. All parents and students will want to access our new Online Learning Portal where all necessary information, links, updates, etc will be posted. Here is the link: Minford Online Learning Portal

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; color: #1d2129; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px

div.span: For all families who pick up food at Minford Elementary on Mondays:

p.style: margin: 6px 0px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.p: The food pick-up time has been changed to 10:00am until 11:00am in front of the elementary school. This will start on Monday, April 20th.

img.title: Online Book Fair
img.span: Online Book Fair - April 20 to May 3

div.span: We miss our library students and hope you and your families are doing well!
We will not be having our spring book fair at school this year, but we are still offering students a chance to purchase books online.
A percentage of book sales will go toward buying books for the library. All books purchased will be delivered to your homes.
If you have any questions, feel free to send an email to [email protected]
Visit this link to access our online book fair directly:

a.style: font-family: inherit; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 14px; color: #385898; cursor: pointer

div.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 12px; background-color: #ffffff
zoom: 1; background-color: #f2f3f5; overflow: hidden; z-index: 0; margin-left: -12px; margin-right: -12px; font-family: inherit

a.div: Visit our school's homepage to hear the latest Book Fair news, RSVP for events, sign up to volunteer, and more!

span.style: background-color: #ffffff; color: #1d2129; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px

span.span: We will be accepting food donations Monday, April 20th from 8:30 - 12:00 in the Elementary School office. Here is a list of suggested donations:

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

span.p:
-Canned Ravioli, Spaghetti, etc. (easy-open lids are appreciated)
-Microwaveable Mac & Cheese
-Ramen Noodles
-Individual bags of chips, cookies, crackers
-Fruit Snacks
-Individual applesauce or fruit cups
-Jars of Peanut Butter
-Cereal Bars
-Individual Boxes of Cereal

div.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff
div.p: *No donation will be turned away, but avoiding frozen or refrigerated food is much appreciated
The district is purchasing food as well, but as much as we can provide is the best possible scenario. Thank you!

br.span: Click here to read the minutes from the March 10, 2020 Board of Education meeting.

span.div: This site will servie as a central hub for us to share information, news, and links to parents and students for our Online Learning Services:

div.a: Click Here to Access the Site

div.span: Free MARCS Resources for All Students Grades K-6

br.span: Here are some great resources for all students Grades K-6. These are not required activities, but some great things at home that parents and students can do. Check it out: Click Here

div.span: I hope you are staying safe and healthy during these times. In these times of unknown schedules for both you the school and us the hospital for the safety of students and staff, Southern Ohio Medical is cancelling sports physicals set to start on May 1.

span.span: The physicals will be rescheduled for July 27, 28 and 29 at the SOMC Friends Center. We will coordinate with each school to schedule dates for students to come for their physicals.
